article.Heading: Budget 2016 India: A2Z Infra up; Govt allots Rs 9000cr for Swachh Bharat Mission
article.Summary: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley has allocated Rs 9000 crore towards Swachh Bharat Mission in the Union Budget 2016-17.
article.Body:
Finance Minister Arun Jaitley has allocated Rs 9000 crore towards Swachh Bharat Mission in the Union Budget 2016-17.

At 11:42 hrs A2Z Infra Engineering was quoting at Rs 18, up Rs 0.20, or 1.12 percent.
